abstract: cpc to host ` the secret of the beginning ' talks on jan 5,6 .
article: cairo -- 28 december 2017 : cairo photography club will host `` the secret of the beginning '' talks by various professional photographers on january 5 , 6 . the main aim of the forthcoming talks is introducing different methods for beginners to start a professional photography career and to develop their skills , imagination and ideas . six professional photographers ... cairo -- 28 december 2017 : cairo photography club will host `` the secret of the beginning '' talks by various professional photographers on january 5 , 6 . the main aim of the forthcoming talks is introducing different methods for beginners to start a professional photography career and to develop their skills , imagination and ideas .

six professional photographers from six different photography fields will review several theories , and exchange knowledge and experience . `` the secret of the beginning '' will also frame guidelines for beginners to follow their real passion and catch their hidden talents . the speakers are videographer mohamed khaled , fine art and conceptual photographer menna hossam , beauty photographer mohamed eid , wedding photographer ali samer , stock photographer amr hassanein , and street photographer hossam manadely .
